title: Adele's family left 'disappointed' by claims she secretly married partner Simon Konecki in the US
text:
Showbiz Adele's family left 'disappointed' by claims she secretly married partner Simon Konecki in the US The Someone Like You singer appeared to confirm her nuptials when she referred to her "husband" at the Grammys - and her family are said to feel a tad left out Share Adele and Simon Konecki are said to have got married in secret (Photo: Getty Images North America) Share     
Adele's family have been stunned by claims she has secretly married. 
There have been rumours the Someone Like You singer has wed partner Simon Konecki since she thanked her “husband” at the recent Grammys. 
But the news has baffled their relatives – who say they didn’t have a clue it was happening, and thought they would tie the knot later this year. 
Charity boss Simon, 42, was seen with a gold band on his wedding finger at Wednesday’s Brit Awards and Adele , 28, has also been spotted wearing one. Adele appeared to confirm her nuptials at the Grammys (Photo: Getty Images North America) The singer thanked her "husband" in her speech (Photo: Getty Images North America) 
Now relatives hope she will clear things up and hold a celebration this summer. 
A source close to the star said: “Adele and Simon have a big family but some of those closest to them weren’t aware of any impending wedding and were shocked to hear one might have gone ahead. Adele and Simon at the Grammys (Photo: Recording Academy/ Grammys /Youtube) 
"They feel disappointed if it’s true. They understand they’re a private couple but are surprised to see them potentially cut out their loved ones.” 
The Sunday Mirror revealed the pair – who have a four-year-old son, Angelo – secretly got engaged last October. 
One source claims some family members believe a summer wedding in Sussex is still on the cards. 
Adele has yet to comment on the speculation. Like us on Facebook
